rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg001
rows.name:
Ohhh, amazing!
What a spectacular sight!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg002
rows.name: Look at this!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg003
rows.name:
This one's a military
transport vessel... and that is
what we'd call a destroyer!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg004
rows.name:
You seem to be really
enjoying yourself,
Newt.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg005
rows.name:
You seem to be really
enjoying yourself, Newt.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg006
rows.name:
Newt,
you genuinely seem
to be having a good time.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg007
rows.name:
You're really havin' fun,
aren'tcha, Newt?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg008
rows.name: Naturally!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg009
rows.name:
We have Superbia's most
advanced warships
right in front of us!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg010
rows.name: How could I not be excited!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg011
rows.name: Oh! Look at that!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg012
rows.name:
That one being maintained over there is
the cutting-edge amphibious
assault vessel!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg013
rows.name:
That vessel belongs to
the First Division of the
Second Imperial Guard.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg014
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg015
rows.name:
Newt, you really are
passionate about
battleships, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg016
rows.name:
Newt, you really are passionate
about the Superbian military,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg017
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg018
rows.name:
Newt, you really
like battleships, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg019
rows.name:
Newt, you really
like the Superbian army, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg020
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg021
rows.name:
Newt, you truly do like
battleship-type vessels, don't you.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg022
rows.name:
Newt, you truly
do like Superbia's military, don't you.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg023
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg024
rows.name:
Ya really do like
battleships, don'tcha Newt?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg025
rows.name:
Ya really do like
the Superbian army, don'tcha Newt?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg026
rows.name: That's incorrect!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg027
rows.name:
Eh?
...Different?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg028
rows.name:
Eh?
...Is it different?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg029
rows.name: What do you mean it's incorrect?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg030
rows.name: Whatcha mean it's not right?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg031
rows.name:
It's a common misconception
that people have...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg032
rows.name:
"Battleship" is actually just
one classification
among many types of warships...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg033
rows.name:
The more suitable terms would be
"combat vessel" or "warship."

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg034
rows.name:
Broadly speaking, warship categories
include destroyers, escort vessels,
cruisers, and battleships...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg035
rows.name:
Furthermore, there are also transport
ships and special operation
vessels for specific missions...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg036
rows.name:
And they can be classified by their
specific roles, size, their
capabilities, and weaponry...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg038
rows.name: I get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg039
rows.name:
I can't process all that
information at once.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg040
rows.name: Alright, alright!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg041
rows.name:
I said I can't process all
that information at once.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg042
rows.name: That's enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg043
rows.name:
My apologies for speaking out of turn.
I'll be more mindful of
my terminology in the future.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg044
rows.name: I said that's enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg045
rows.name:
I understood well enough,
so don't go on and on like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg046
rows.name:
Is that so?
But it gets exciting from here...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg047
rows.name:
In that case, I'll save the rest
for when we have more time!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg048
rows.name: Whoa!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg049
rows.name:
That's the Imperial Guard's special
operations vessel!
I can't believe we're seeing it here!!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg050
rows.name:
Come on, honored Driver,
let's run over there!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg052
rows.name: Obviously!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg053
rows.name:
The Superbian army is
the greatest military in the world!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg054
rows.name:
Unlike other nations, Superbia has
integrated the military structure
directly into its governmental system.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg055
rows.name:
They invest heavily in researching
historical technologies, then enhance,
modify them with their own innovations.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg056
rows.name:
They apply these discoveries to create
cutting-edge military technology!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg057
rows.name:
Incidentally, since Invidia's forces
depend on mercenaries for
their military power...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg058
rows.name:
Their soldier training and equipment
types are inconsistent, making it hard
to consider them
a properly balanced force.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg059
rows.name:
Also, with Meleph-dono at
the forefront, Superbia has many
capable generals and commanders...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg061
rows.name:
Ah, I get it!
That's enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg062
rows.name:
There's no way
I can remember all that.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg063
rows.name:
I understand!
I said that's enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg064
rows.name:
I can't absorb all that information
when you dump it on me all at once.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg065
rows.name:
Apologies, but that will suffice.
I've grasped the concept from
what you've told me.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg066
rows.name:
I get it, I get it!
That's enough already.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg067
rows.name:
I can't remember all that
if ya explain it all at once, ya know.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg068
rows.name:
Now, now, don't be like that.
There's still much more to come!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg069
rows.name:
From here,
I'll have the honor of sharing
the heroic tales of each commander.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg070
rows.name:
Come now, prepare to listen intently
until dawn!
